page.title: 07INDUSTRY
page.content: There is an industrial estate, begun in 1960, comprising of some 9 factories which manufacture{marine {spars and fittings, kitchen equipment, {aluminium windows, injection mouldings {and marine windows. A child wrote "We went to C.S.B.Moulds They make plastic mouldings like make-up containers and inhalers for medical purposes.They send them all over the world.The factory has been there for 8 years. There are 70 ladies and 40 men who work for 12 hours a day.There is a drawing room.The drawings looked very complicated with lots of lines.These designs were for the machines to make the moulds.We saw the inhalers being made,they make 30 million a year.Then we saw the ladies checking the mouldings and the packing room where all the boxes were stacked up on top of each other."
